steps.title: Create Your Project & Record Complete Feature Flow
steps.description: Install extension and capture comprehensive user workflows
content: **Install the Chrome Extension** - Add the AutoTester Chrome Extension and pin it to your toolbar

**Create a new project** by providing:
• Recording name (e.g., "User Login Flow")
• Your app's starting URL
• Brief description of your web application

**Record your complete feature** — Be thorough:
• ✅ **Click on ALL necessary fields** (required and optional)
• ✅ **Fill out forms completely** — don't skip any inputs
• ✅ **Navigate through the entire user journey** from start to finish
• ✅ **Include success/error scenarios** — try both valid and invalid inputs
• ✅ **Interact with all UI elements** — buttons, dropdowns, checkboxes, etc.
**Stop recording** when you've covered the complete feature
steps.proTip: The more complete your recording, the better AI can understand your app and generate comprehensive test cases

steps.title: Validate Flow & Generate Test Cases
steps.description: Review recordings and let AI generate comprehensive test scenarios
content: **Review your recorded flow** — AutoTester analyzes everything you captured

**Add assertions and validations**:
• ✅ **Validate success messages** — confirm expected outcomes
• ✅ **Check error handling** — verify proper error messages appear
• ✅ **Validate field requirements** — ensure mandatory fields are enforced
• ✅ **Confirm navigation flows** — verify correct page transitions

**AI generates comprehensive test scenarios** including:
• Edge cases and boundary conditions
• Error scenarios and negative testing
• Field validation and form submission checks
**Select and customize test cases** — choose which scenarios are most important for your app
steps.proTip: Use descriptive names for your recordings to help AI generate better test cases

steps.title: AI Creates Executable Test Steps
steps.description: AI processes your workflow and creates optimized test automation
content:
**AI processes your validated flow** and generates:
• Optimized test steps with minimal actions
• Proper element locators and interactions
• Smart success/failure assertions with specific messages
• Complete test workflows from start to finish
**Review and refine** — customize test steps if needed
**Your test suite is ready** — no coding required!
steps.proTip: Review AI suggestions and customize test cases to match your specific requirements

steps.title: Run Tests & Catch Bugs
steps.description: Execute your automated tests and get detailed results
content: **Execute your test suite** with one click

**Get detailed results** showing:
• What passed and what failed
• Screenshots of any issues
• Specific error messages and assertions
steps.proTip: Start simple with your core user flows like login, checkout, or key user actions
